generated_body: The article likely features a collection of powerful side-by-side portraits showcasing individuals over 100 years old alongside images of their younger selves. Readers may expect to explore themes of aging, nostalgia, and the passage of time, with the portraits serving as a visual representation of life experiences and changes over the decades. The piece could include insights or anecdotes from the subjects about their lives, offering a glimpse into their journeys and the wisdom they've gained. Overall, it may provide a reflective look at the impact of time on identity and memory.
